body.html:
hi, the Beverly Hills location has confirmed they have availability. They have contacted you through instagram dm, and if you have any more questions you can reach out to them as well. Some details about the posting guidelines recommendations (they’re not required)

Location: 225 S Beverly Dr, Beverly Hills, CA 90212, USA

Key Focus Points:
Premium Ingredients: Uses Japanese wagyu and domestic wagyu as well as fresh seafood for the open sushi bar

Affordable Luxury: Serves premium wagyu at a lower cost due to bulk purchasing and in-house partnerships.

Authentic Flavor: Uses a custom blend of 25 spices inspired by century-old Japanese curry recipes.

Expert Craftsmanship: Menu developed with guidance from a Michelin One Star Chef.

Unique Dining Experience: Open grill allows guests to watch experienced chefs cook their meals.

Diverse Menu: Offers both Japanese curry dishes and sushi/sashimi options. Cold sake, hot sake and beers are availble as well.

Iconic Dishes: Signature Wagyu Curry, Wagyu Steak Rice Bowl, Chicken Katsu and Chef Specialties like deluxe sashimi platter.

Memorable Atmosphere: Modern ambiance, two floors, dimly lit setting, anime-inspired decor, and lively environment. Also, second-floor offers buy-out/private events (cuztomized menu is available)

#Hashtages: #chubbycurry #LAFoodAdventures #LAFoodScene #Wagyu #JapaneseCurryLA #Covinarestaurants

[Instagram]

Tag people (invite collaborators): @chubbycurryla @chubby.group

Add location: Covina, California

[Tiktok]

@ Mention: will update soon

Location: Chubby Curry (225 S Beverly Dr, Beverly Hills)

Point of Contact:
Blair: 3102725963

items.subject: Exclusive Invitation: Premium Dining Experience with Chubby Group for soflofooodie

body.html:
Hi soflofooodie,
I'm Blair from Chubby Group – a premium Japanese Wagyu fine-dining chain. I saw your recent video about food review on Instagram and began exploring more of your content in food reviews topics. Your influence in Orlando is really impressive. Our collab program still have a couple spots left, and I'd like to invite you for a complimentary dining experience (with plus one, usually valued at $120-$180) at any of our restaurants for a Restaurant Review Instagram Reel and Tiktok Video:

California:
Los Angeles: Chubby Cattle Little Tokyo
Pleasanton: Chubby Cattle
Beverly Hills: Chubby Curry
Covina: Chubby Curry
Cerritos: Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House

I'm Cecilla from Chubby Group – a premium Japanese Wagyu fine-dining chain. I saw your recent video about bacon recipe in slow cooker on Instagram and began exploring more of your content in comfort food topics. Your influence in your area is really impressive. Our collab program still have a couple spots left, and I'd like to invite you for a complimentary dining experience (with plus one, usually valued at $120-$180) at any of our restaurants for a Restaurant Review Instagram Reel and Tiktok Video:

California:
Los Angeles: Chubby Cattle Little Tokyo
Pleasanton: Chubby Cattle
Beverly Hills: Chubby Curry
Covina: Chubby Curry
Cerritos: Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House
Monterey Park: Chubby Cattle
Rowland Heights: Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House
Rowland Heights: Chubby Cattle
Rowland Heights: Chubby Skewers
Other Cities:
New York City: Chubby Skewers
Chicago: Chubby Cattle
Chicago: Wagyu House by The X Pot
Las Vegas: Chubby Cattle
Philadelphia: Chubby Cattle
Atlanta: Wagyu House Atlanta
Duluth, GA: Chubby Cattle BBQ Duluth


Please reply with Your preferred location and I'll check with the restaurant's collaboration reservation availability for you.


Looking forward to seeing you soon,
Cecilla
Marketing Manager
Chubby Group
